artist: after Scott Leighton; Publisher: Currier and Ives
creditline: Gift of Ruth A. and Elliot J. Brebner
inscription: Printed inscription: The celebrated trotting Team Edward and Swiveller, owned by Frank Work Esq. N.Y.: Winning their match for $1, 000, against time 2:20 to Wagon, driven by John Murphy. At the gentlemen's driving park, Morrisania, N.Y. July 8th, 1882. Record 2:16 3/4.
provenance: Ruth A. And Elliot J. Brebner, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 1996.
title: The Celebrated Trotting Team, Edward and Swiveller, Owned by Frank Work, Esq. N.Y.
